attributes.action: Place a road tax and MoT on caravans in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vehicles that pull caravans require to use more fuel and not enviromentely friendly. There is no guarantee that any caravan on UK roads are roadworthy as other vehicles. This would also be an option to use on trailers as well.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
